alert.note: Alert for Greene; Monroe; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:21AM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River, Eagle Creek, and Eel River. .Melted snowpack combined with rainfall amounts of one to over two inches from Wednesday evening through today falling on frozen ground has caused significant runoff which will produce flooding along area rivers. Along the main stem rivers, flooding could be lengthened and possibly worsened by another storm system next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Spencer. * WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 19.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later today.
